commodities.dataaccess.dataloader
Class DailyDataLoaderCBOT

java.lang.Object
  commodities.dataaccess.dataloader.DailyDataLoaderCBOT
public class DailyDataLoaderCBOT
extends Object

The DailyDataLoaderCBOT processes the data files that originate from the Chicago Board of Trade (CBOT).

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

                                   String commoditySymbol,
                                   String databaseSymbol,
                                   String monthSymbol,
                                   int year,

Retrieve the data file from the Internet and save it.

Parameters:
today - Todays date
commoditySymbol - The symbol for the commodity to retrieve
databaseSymbol - The database symbol for the commodity to retrieve
monthSymbol - The symbol of the commodity month
year - The year of data to retrieve
currentMonth - Is it the current month

Parameters:
data - the web page to be parsed
contract - the web page to be parsed
commoditySymbol - the symbol for the commodity to retrieve
databaseSymbol - the database symbol for the commodity to retrieve

loadPrices

protected static void loadPrices(String fileName)
                          throws IOException
Process the daily CBOT text files by loading them into the database and backing them up to the directory defined by the folder.commodity_data_backup property in the dataaccess.properties file.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file to be loaded
Throws:
IOException

repositionOutFile

protected static PrintWriter repositionOutFile(File origFile)
                                        throws IOException
Reposition the output file to add additional records at the end.

Parameters:
origFile - the output file to reposition to the end
Returns:
the PrintWriter to continue using
Throws:
IOException

loadFromBOT

private static void loadFromBOT(String s)
Load prices from the BOT file format. This format was valid from 02/01/02 thru 07/03/03.

Parameters:
s - The line from the file to load prices from

loadFromCBOT

private static void loadFromCBOT(String s)
Load prices from the CBOT file format. This format was valid from 07/07/03 thru present.

Parameters:
s - The line from the file to load prices from
